 Er (Erbium), Nd (Neodymium) - Obtain from rare earth element suppliers.

 Si (Silicon) - Buy from electronics or chemical suppliers.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out the specified amounts of each material using a precise scale. 
 2. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine Cs, Er, Nd, Se, and Si.
